paragraphs.text: To those who celebrate the day, Happy Easter!

paragraphs.text: I’m just relieved. These conversations, however necessary, are exhausting. I’m glad this one has reached it’s mysterious conclusion.

paragraphs.text: First, he honestly used Judge Judy and Dr. Phil as his control group for his cross sampling of Americans??? What a TURD!!

paragraphs.name: fc39

paragraphs.text: To which I have always replied that he seems to be a nice guy, one I agree with on some things and disagree with on others. Our conversations on politics and religion have always been civil. And I have a policy. I have dedicated myself to having conversations with those with whom I disagree, because expanding my world view is part of why I am on this platform in the first place.
paragraphs.name: 8a4b

paragraphs.text: Just another “rugged individualist” that is so fragile that he blocked me the first time I called him out for directly what he is. RE. an ignorant coward.

It is challenging enough to engage in deep conversation with text and few emojis…to enable this level of discourse we need to put extra effort in to silencing the inner and outer critic as we do not have our normal…

a67738f1424b.title: Thank you for “doing the work” of having these conversations.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for “doing the work” of having these conversations. I try to do the same, and it’s always disappointing when someone blocks, rather than just stepping away from a particular thread. The belief that the average citizen is like those portrayed on the worst reality shows is disturbing, and dismissive of the different kinds of intelligent…
paragraphs.name: b2f5

paragraphs.text: Michael and Meg, think his account is gone. I can’t get to his profile but it doesn’t say I’m blocked. We’ve never exchanged a single word. ?? Byyyyeeeee..?
paragraphs.name: 731e

paragraphs.text: Anyways I love a block party! BLOCK PARTY on a Sunday off! Woohoo! Sign me up. Ok time for coffee.

paragraphs.text: If it was taken down by Medium, I would really like to know why.

paragraphs.text: Thanks for this, Classical Sass. I am so un-hep to this blocking thing that I didn’t realize that I would have found an account with the message I was blocked if the account still existed. I’ve updated my piece to reflect the new info. (also tagging you Michael Ramsburg, in case a edited-in tag on an existing piece doesn’t flag you)
paragraphs.name: dea0

3c8a1bb2ce7e.title: I remember having the same WTF Y U BLOCK ME BRO?!

paragraphs.text: I remember having the same WTF Y U BLOCK ME BRO?! post after Thin Man had his account deleted. Turns out he deleted his account in protest that Medium didnt ban a particular user that turned out to be a self proclaimed pedophile against molestation. He was trying to normalize pedophillic desire as a harmless thing and Thin Man took extreme exception…
paragraphs.name: ae8f

paragraphs.text: Yes, I can’t imagine what he would have done to recieve the wrath. He was always civil in what I read — though often direct with his opinions, which isn’t a bad thing at all. Maybe he deleted his account himself. Not sure, just weird. I’d hope not though. I didn’t always agree with him, but he did offer a different voice on this platform. Medium…

paragraphs.name: f984

paragraphs.text: Interesting, questionable sequence of events. Meg, I DO appreciate your willingness to challenge, teach, transgress, learn, to find common ground. Unless we human invest here, in this regard, we are doomed as a species on this spaceship.
